Data.oldValue: NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM M_InOut io INNER JOIN M_InOutLine il ON(il.M_InOut_ID = io.M_InOut_ID) WHERE io.DocStatus IN('CO', 'CL') AND il.C_OrderLine_ID = iobl.C_OrderLine_ID AND iobl.PickedQty >= M_InOutLine.MovementQty) AND iob.IsSOTrx='Y' AND iobl.Processed='Y' AND ol.QtyOrdered <> ol.QtyDelivered

PO.Data: NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM M_InOut io INNER JOIN M_InOutLine il ON(il.M_InOut_ID = io.M_InOut_ID) WHERE io.DocStatus IN('CO', 'CL') AND il.C_OrderLine_ID = iobl.C_OrderLine_ID AND iobl.PickedQty >= il.MovementQty) AND iob.IsSOTrx='Y' AND iobl.Processed='Y' AND ol.QtyOrdered <> ol.QtyDelivered
